features: MOVEMENT: Swiss made quartz 3 hand movement.
DIAL: The dial features applied stainless steel hour and number indices as well as a printed seconds track, custom molded hands, and a 60 second subdial with printed markers every 5 seconds.
CASE: 38mm, 100 meter/10 ATM custom stainless steel case, fixed stainless steel bezel, hardened mineral crystal, double gasket crown, stainless steel screw down caseback, and spring pin lugs.
BAND: 21mm-18mm tapered custom stainless steel 3 link bracelet with stainless steel double locking clasp with micro adjust.
